title: Create FO-01 agent with AP-01 quality guidelines
description:
Create the FO-01 agent following GT-01/AF-01 simple agent pattern.

Files to create:
- src/mastra/agents/fo-01/agent.ts
- src/mastra/agents/fo-01/index.ts

Agent requirements:
- Static agent export: fo01Agent
- Factory function: createFO01Agent(implementation)
- System prompt includes AP-01's detailed affirmation guidelines (structure, opener distribution, length, tone, power verbs, avoid list)
- Generates 100 affirmations from user intention
- Returns JSON array

Register in src/mastra/index.ts singleton.

Reference: src/mastra/agents/alt-process-1/agent.ts for quality guidelines
Reference: src/mastra/agents/ag-good-ten/agent.ts for pattern
acceptance_criteria: Agent created, registered in Mastra, follows AP-01 quality guidelines
closed_reason: Created FO-01 agent in src/mastra/agents/fo-01/ with static fo01Agent export and createFO01Agent factory function. System prompt includes full AP-01 quality guidelines (structure, openers, length, tone, power verbs, avoid list). Agent generates 100 affirmations as JSON array from user intention. Registered in src/mastra/index.ts singleton.
